name: Hamiko Dating Simulator
description:
This is a dating sim where you can try to get the vtubers Fumiko Hoshi and Hampwned to date. I do not actually ship them in real life, but I do like their bit where they act like they are married. There is canon-typical explicit dialogue. Fullscreen mode should fix any formatting errors.

This was written because Fumi asked off-handedly where their dating sim was, and so I decided to spend a few hours quickly making this. It's her birthday after all. I'm sure there are no flaws. I see the capitalization errors and you should embrace them.

yes I had to make an account just to figure out where to upload this

I DON'T KNOW WHY THE FONT IS LIKE THAT ON MOBILE
